description: Green Ronin Publishing has launched a crowdfunding campaign on BackerKit for a new edition of The Expanse Roleplaying Game, based on the novels by James S.A. Corey. The campaign introduces official Expanse miniatures for the first time, a notable addition to the game. Green Ronin has teamed up with Wargames Atlantic to offer two sets...
title: Green Ronin Launches Crowdfunding Campaign for New Edition of The Expanse RPG, Featuring Miniatures for the First Time

description: Paizo has revealed its lineup for September, offering a variety of new content for both Pathfinder and Starfinder players. Pathfinder Adventure Path #206: Bring the House Down The Curtain Call Adventure Path concludes with Bring the House Down, an adventure designed for high-level characters. Players must navigate the final preparations of a grand opera, where...
title: Paizo Announces September Releases

description: Two Acorns Games has launched Dungeons of the Oak Dell, a new roll-and-write dungeon crawler for 1 to 4 players, on Kickstarter. The game draws inspiration from classic PC titles like Dungeon Master, Eye of the Beholder, and Grimrock. Combining rondel and dice drafting mechanics, it offers players a mix of strategic exploration and combat...
title: Dungeons of the Oak Dell: A Roguelite Dungeon Crawler Inspired by PC Classics Now on Kickstarter

description: Fantasy Flight Games has announced the release of The Innsmouth Conspiracy Investigator Expansion for Arkham Horror: The Card Game, now available at local retailers and through their online store. This new addition immerses players in the eerie world of Innsmouth, where ancient secrets and dark conspiracies await discovery. The expansion brings five new investigators, each...
title: Fantasy Flight Games Releases The Innsmouth Conspiracy Investigator Expansion

description: The iconic Traveller roleplaying game, a cornerstone of science fiction RPGs since 1977, continues to expand with the release of the Fifth Frontier War miniatures by 2nd Dynasty, now available on Kickstarter. Officially licensed and created in collaboration with Mongoose Publishing, these 28mm-scale miniatures and vehicles bring the battles of the Fifth Frontier War to...
title: 2nd Dynasty’s Fifth Frontier War Miniatures Now on Kickstarter

description: Pandasaurus Games has revealed the upcoming release of Boxtop Pinball: Haunted House, a dice-flicking pinball game with a haunted house theme. Players will take on challenges such as defeating monsters, uncovering hidden clues, and avoiding trap doors, all while aiming to achieve the highest score. In this dexterity game, players flick dice from a launch...
title: Pandasaurus Games Announces “Boxtop Pinball: Haunted House” in Time For Halloween

description: A new Kickstarter campaign has been launched for JudoGrid, a fully customizable, 3D-printable modular display system designed for collectors of miniatures, action figures, and other collectibles. The project offers a flexible and adaptive solution for enthusiasts who want to create personalized displays to showcase their collections, providing all the necessary .STL files to allow users...
title: JudoGrid Launches on Kickstarter: A Customizable 3D Printable Display System

description: Battlezoo has just released Battlezoo Ancestries: Fairy Dragons, a new supplement now available for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition and Pathfinder 2nd Edition. This 100+ page book takes players and game masters deep into the realm of the fey, introducing new dragons from the fairy dragon family. The book follows the journey of dragon researcher...
title: Battlezoo Fairy Dragons is Now Available for 5E and Pathfinder

description: Emberleaf is a competitive card-dancing and tile-placement game that invites players into the role of Emberlings, determined to rebuild their homes in the heart of an ancient forest. Designed for 1-5 players, the game combines strategic resource management and tactical decisions, as players explore the wilderness, clear dangerous areas, and construct new homes for their...
title: Emberleaf: A New Card-Dancing and Tile-Placement Game on Kickstarter

description: In the bustling city of Lapis, where the ordinary meets the extraordinary, heroes are not born—they are awakened. title: Magi-Knights Awakening Review – A Fusion of ’90s Anime and 5E Fantasy
